DEFAULT_DUMPER.description: Default dumper for saving data to disk. This dumper will be used when the `dumper` kwarg is undefined.

DEFAULT_DATA_BASE.description: The main class for managing the data base. It provides methods to load, save, and manage data.

DATA_BASE_REGISTER_PATH.description: Path to the data base register file, relative to the project source. This file is used to keep track of registered data bases.
